Pe, nke a na-akpọkwa Pai, bụ obere asụsụ ndi Plateau nke Naịjirịa
E kewara ya na alaka dị iche iche nke Plateau, mana a na-ahụ ya ugbu a dị ka Tarokoid (Blench 2008).
Obodo nta Pe dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Pankshin
Ha bụ: Dok (Dokpai) (obodo ukwu), Tipap Kwi, Tipap Re, Bwer, Kup (=Tiniŋ), Ban, Kwasam, na Kamcik
Obodo nta ndị ọzọ onye ọkà mmụta asụsụ Roger Blench weere na ha enweghị nkwenye bụ Yong, Jak, Bil, Bwai, Wopti, Kanchi, ya na Yuwan.
